p: Ethical permission for the study was obtained from the Ethical Review Committee of the Faculty of Medicine, University of Kelaniya, Sri Lanka (Ref. No. P/238/12/2014). Permission to conduct the study was obtained from the Regional Director of Health Services and Regional Epidemiologist of the District of Gampaha. The MOH officers and Public Health Inspectors (PHI) in study areas were informed prior to initiating the study.
